abstract: Chalk up another deal for Carl C. Icahn. American Real Estate Properties, a unit of Mr. Icahn’s American Real Estate Partners, said Monday it was selling its Nevada gaming operations to Whitehall Street Real Estate Funds, an affiliate of Goldman Sachs for $1.3 billion.
lead_paragraph: Chalk up another deal for Carl C. Icahn. American Real Estate Properties, a unit of Mr. Icahn’s American Real Estate Partners, said Monday it was selling its Nevada gaming operations to Whitehall Street Real Estate Funds, an affiliate of Goldman Sachs for $1.3 billion.

headline.main: Goldman Unit to Acquire Icahn’s Nevada Casinos
